ygData.subject: Re: House Ryal - Looking for Members
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey how are you?Well I am a level 16 shamen(barb)and if you would tell me more about your guild,,what you guys stand for how you propose to help fellow guild
ygData.messageBody:
Hey how are you?Well I am a level 16 shamen(barb)and if you would tell me more about your guild,,what you guys stand for how you propose to help fellow guild members.
My idea of a good guild is to help fellow guild members,,,,an example if i was a master tailer i would make armour for my guild members free of charge,,,and if you got out of line well we kill you just like the mob if you canot up hold the meanings of being in a guild then death is what you get.......
We help out the new members by helping them level to upper levels as soon as possible,,,,i was once in a very bad guild called WOLF CLAN man they had to be one of the most unorganized guilds i have ever seen in my life....it got very boring for me,,,,,when i asked them that i wanted to leave the guild they triied to pk me but we very wrong i managed to take out 3 of there warriors in 1 round i just rooted them and let them die.
The key word is being (((((organized))))) and living up tp guild standards,,,,always help guild members.

Anyways i have blabbed long enough please fill me in on how i can join and what is your plan on getting this guild going


My character namer is VENTURA right now i binded myself in UNREST I am making a killing off armour that i get there off dark bones.

Rick
----- Original Message -----
From: Remlin
To: EQ Shadowknights List
Sent: Sunday, June 20, 1999 10:26 AM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] House Ryal - Looking for Members <Rallos Zek>


To those of Evil Blood,
House Ryal of Neriak is looking for new Adventurers to join its ranks. If you have reached the 5th level of training in your guild or are of close achievment, and have a heart pure of honor and courage, than write me with your interest of membership. For those of lower rank we wish to help you progress up into the higher levels quickly and we can help you achieve this.

Safe Travels Under the Harsh Sun

Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
<rallos zek>
